name: Tamed Admin Theme
author: Luc Awater

sections.description:
ANNOUNCEMENT!
I am very pleased to tell you all that this plugin now went PRO with lots more features and style improvements. It will be constantly updated and supported at: http://codecanyon.net/item/tamed-wordpress-admin-theme/13800689. Unfortunately, that means this repository will receive no further updates and/or support. Thanks!

This is a simple plugin, transforming your WordPress backend into a more calm, clean and overall prettier place to work.
sections.installation:
This plugin doesn’t need much installation or configuration.

  1. Upload the ‘tamed-admin-theme’ directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this plugin in any way influence my frontend?

Nope, it does not. It is just a way to give a nice touch to the backend.

  • overall tidying up and straightening out

short_description: A basic, clean and minimalistic Wordpress admin theme.
